svcsubproc.title: Shutter-to-Radiator
svcsubproc.para: In this configuration, the shutter assembly is mounted to the horsecollar front flange, and is located in front of the radiator (or radiator/charge air cooler) assembly.
Refer to Figure 9 for the following Items in parentheses.

figure.caption: Figure 9. Shutter Replacement For Shutter-to-Radiator Configuration

step1.para: On 3900FC, remove the grille to gain access to the shutter assembly (Item 2, Figure 9). On other vehicles, unlatch and open the hood.
Remove the air or hydraulic line from the air conditioning (if so equipped) override valve (Item 5) that is mounted to the horsecollar flange (Item 3), and from the shutter control valve (Item 6).

Remove the 5/16 - 18 x 1 flanged hex head bolts (Item 7) that secure the shutter to the front horsecollar flange through the recirculation shield. Retain the bolts. Remove and dispose of the shutter assembly.
Assemble the new shutter assembly to the horsecollar through the recirculation shield with the hardware previously removed. Tighten the bolts to 155 - 190 in-lb (17.5 - 21.4 N•m).
Assemble the air or hydraulic line to the air conditioning (if so equipped) override valve. Attach the line to the shutter control valve.
On 3900FC, install the grille assembly. On other vehicles, close and latch the hood.

svcsubproc.title: Shutter-to-Charge Air Cooler
svcsubproc.para: In this configuration, the shutter assembly is mounted to the front of the charge air cooler.
Refer to Figure 10for the following Items in parentheses.

figure.caption: Figure 10. Shutter Replacement For Shutter-to-Charge Air Cooler Configuration

step1.para: Unlatch and open the vehicle hood to provide access to the shutter assembly (Item 2, Figure 10) fastened to the front of the charge air cooler (Item 1).
Remove the air or hydraulic line (Item 5) from the shutter control valve (Item 4).
Remove the 5/16 - 18 x 1 flanged hex head bolts (Item 3) that secure the shutter assembly to the front of the cooler. Retain the bolts. Remove and dispose of the shutter assembly.
Assemble the new shutter assembly to the charge air cooler with the hardware previously removed. Tighten the bolts to 155 - 190 in-lb (17.5 - 21.4 N•m).
Assemble the air or hydraulic line to the air conditioning (if so equipped) override valve. Attach the supply line to the shutter control valve.
